body: this manga is 2nd Amanonja9 manga to be official going to be translated in west
Awesome I love it nice job the amanoja9 you are awesome.

This...THIS doujin captures the true essence of The Amanoja9 from the days of old! when a man who was unsure of himself experiences sex with another man (shemale) for the first time, and it slowly dawns on him that he never felt such true / raw pleasure until that very moment in his insignificant life and becomes "turned" as a result but only to experience the apex of a relationship that could only be obtained between two men.... 

but meh on the 2nd part tho...hope there's a continuation to it
